titlesplash.name: 600ft
titlesplash.description: In the depths of the ocean, where sunlight rarely pierces through the water's murky veil, there you live aboard a submarine. It's a world in itself, a metal giant that flows through the undersea depths, carrying a diverse crew of sailors into the unknown. But within the confines of this steel vessel, reality begins to blur, and sanity is a fragile commodity. As you walk the fine line between reality and illusion, your interactions with the crew will shape your journey. Will you uncover the truth of what's happening on board, or will you succumb to the inevitable madness and fall victim to an unknown truth? You must talk to your fellow crew members and find out what is really going on. There are several objects and people on board that may point you in the right direction of what’s going on. Make sure you work quickly; a mind is a terrible thing to waste or, in this case, lose...
titlesplash.intro:
You zoned out and slowly come back to reality. You realize you are outside of Chad’s room but vaguely remember coming over to talk to him. You walk through the galley, assuming you needed something from Chad, hoping to remember when you get there. 
At any point, you can type 'help' to bring up valid commands.
titlesplash.Objective: Find out what is going on, on the ship and if there is anyone behind it or if something is behind it...

Items.Advil: Advil can be used to maintain and regain sanity throughout your journey. Just remember you are underwater, and there are limited resources.

rooms.name: Supply Room
rooms.description: It is easy to stop feeling like yourself in such grim conditions thankfully the supply room has just the thing to take the edge off. The room is filled with different medicine and supplies need to make you feel like yourself again

advil.description: Will help to recover lost sanity points and prevent you from falling victim to your thoughts

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: A room that can be described as organized chaos, nothing looks like it is where it is supposed to be but you know where everything is. Oddly enough there is a key on the floor that stands out from the chaos

key.description: A mysterious key lays on the floor, it does not match the dark gloomy feeling of the room. It looks to be lined with gold and have a bright red design on it there is also a name that you cannot make out on it

rooms.name: John's Quarters
rooms.description: A clean and organized room, not pictures or anything to show some type of personality. It has the bare minimum to survive and be comfortable

npc.Name: John
npc.description: A man in his late 20s, not one for conversation prefers to keep to himself
Greetings: What you want I'm off the clock for another 4 hours

PlayerChoices.Choice: Has something felt off with Connor to you?
Has Chad been acting weird to you
PlayerChoices.Response: Chad is always weird with all those voices, if he was acting normal then I'd be concerned

PlayerChoices.Choice: Alan has been pretty on edge, do you think happened?
PlayerChoices.Response: Someone went through his room and put a dent in his safe, so I would be on edge too.

rooms.name: Chad's Quarters
rooms.description: A room full of personality, posters all around with different dragons and fantasy characters.

npc.Name: Chad
npc.description: A man in his late 30s with orange hair and matching beard, he is sitting on his book reading a giant book
Greetings: Hey buddy!!! Great to see you, come on in, I am just reading my DM manual

PlayerChoices.Choice: Have you seen Connor he has been acting a little different
PlayerChoices.Response: Thats a weird question to ask you ok?.

PlayerChoices.Choice: What do you think of John?
PlayerChoices.Response: He is a little introverted but a lot of fun to game with
He is in his room someone destroyed it, not cool at all

rooms.name: Connor's Quarters
rooms.description: A rather plain room, clean and organized but nothing special about it

npc.Name: Connor
npc.description: A pale man with no clear age, stands in center of room not moving

PlayerChoices.Choice: You talk to Chad about the game tonight
PlayerChoices.Response: yes and if not I will

PlayerChoices.Choice: You worked with John right? You get along?

rooms.name: Alan's Quarters
rooms.description: A room that is usually organized and clean is now completely destroyed. There is a dented safe in the corner and boxes and paper thrown across the ground

npc.Name: Alan
Greetings: Hey Green horn what do you need

PlayerChoices.Response: Someone completely destroyed my room, for no clear reason
He was with me when it happened, and no one else could lift my safe
We had some beef but nothing to destroy my room over
I don't think he did it but who knows
